job.title: Automotive Test Engineer
job.description:
Dynamic Research, Inc., a high-tech applied research firm based in Torrance, CA has an immediate opening for an analytically-oriented Test Engineer to work in the automotive industry.
Assignments will include
Conducting instrumented dynamic and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) vehicle testing at our proving grounds near Bakersfield, CA and occasionally at the proving grounds of our clients (may at times involve night and weekend testing)
Instrumenting and preparing vehicles for testing
Writing test reports
Developing test software
Analyzing data
Designing new test equipment
Requirements
BS or MS degree in Mechanical or Aerospace Engineering
0 – 5 years of engineering experience
Familiarity with MATLAB
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Strong automotive interest
US citizen or permanent resident
Strongly desired
Experience with CAD
Background in Dynamics and Control
Familiarity with automotive sensors and data acquisition
Motorsports interest, including performance driving experience
Dynamic Research, Inc. is headquartered in Torrance, CA and has an office in Shafter, CA near Bakersfield. DRI was established in 1979 and specializes in applied research, development, and consulting in the areas of vehicle dynamics and control, man-machine systems, ergonomics, biomechanics, and structural mechanics. In the automotive area this includes analysis, simulation, testing, and prototype design and development. DRI currently has a regular staff of 40, consisting of engineers and scientists, technicians, and support personnel.
Dynamic Research, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
